RelationshipElement.name: TransectSUI
RelationshipElement.description: Defines relationship between Transect and Survey Unit

RelationshipElement.name: Feature - Measurement
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

property.name: Feature timestamp
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}
